name: Light Among The Dark - A game about Hope
name_original: Light Among The Dark - A game about Hope
description:
Find the light! Push the darkness out of the way to find the light!

A game about Mental Health & Hope

A game produced at APU by Jordan Oey for the Game a Week Class Challenge

The Requirements:

  • PuzzleScript
  • Capture/Eliminate - The Player must capture or eliminate the goal(s)
  • Mental Health - A game dealing with good or bad mental health
